heading: office shootings: 3 slain
subheading: a 34-year-old man is in custody following a shooting rampage at two businesses in suburban birmingham, alabama thursday that left three employees dead. the suspect, who has not been identified, was arrested following a car chase down state highway 31 in pelham. the victims were reportedly employed by post airgas and ferguson enterprises, both located in pelham, a town of about 12,000 located 15 miles south of birmingham.
author: wired staff
text: a 34-year-old man is in custody following a shooting rampage at two businesses in suburban birmingham, alabama thursday that left three employees dead. the suspect, who has not been identified, was arrested following a car chase down state highway 31 in pelham. the victims were reportedly employed by post airgas and ferguson enterprises, both located in pelham, a town of about 12,000 located 15 miles south of birmingham.
